thread.title: Emily Ratajkowski flaunts incredible bikini body during impromptu photoshoot as she enjoys fun in the sun
thread.title_full: Emily Ratajkowski flaunts incredible bikini body during impromptu photoshoot as she enjoys fun in the sun

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Emily Ratajkowski flaunts incredible bikini body during impromptu photoshoot as she enjoys fun in the sun
text:
Emily Ratajkowski flaunts incredible bikini body during impromptu photoshoot as she enjoys fun in the sun The model and actress looks all kinds of amazing in her latest Instagram shots Share What a beauty! (Photo: emrata/Instagram) Share Get celebs   Could   
Emily Ratajkowski has just made jaws drop all over - for the millionth time. 
The Blurred Lines babe, 25, is no stranger to a luxury beach break, and the model and actress is currently enjoying some fun in the sun in Malibu. 
And the stunning star didn't waste any time before showing off her famous bikini body in a series of hot social media snaps. 
Posing to camera, the brunette is showcasing her enviable ripped torso and ample cleavage in a white crochet bikini. Emily Ratajkowski (Photo: emrata/Instagram) Emily Ratajkowski (Photo: emrata/Instagram) 
In one hand she's holding a brown straw hat, while the other is resting by her side. 
Emily simply captioned the sexy beach shot - taken by her boyfriend Jess Magid - with "finally" and a sun Emoji. (Photo: Instagram/emily ratajkowski) Emily Ratajkowski (Photo: Instagram/emrata) 
Moments later she followed it up with another jaw-dropping picture as she sits on a towel and turns to face the camera. 
Speaking about how she keeps her body looking so great, she said previously: "I'm very lucky genetically that I don't have to work super hard and freak out over my diet. Read More Emily Ratajkowski, Bella Hadid and Elsa Hosk on holiday together (Photo: Instagram) Emily Ratajkowski (Photo: Splash News) (Photo: Rex) 
"It's about balance. For me it's always about trying to consistently maintain a fit and body-conscious eating schedule so three days before I'm not like, Oh my God, I have a bathing suit shoot I have to do. 
"People always talk about what they do the night before, but to be totally honest what you do the night before isn't going to make a huge difference in how you look. 
"Maybe eating a giant burger and being bloated would make a difference, but other than that it's the lead-up." Like us on Facebook
